text.__SUMMARY__: Prunus adenopoda, known locally as Ki Beusi is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is a tree endemic to Java in Indonesia. It is an endangered species threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Kalkman, C. (1998). "Prunus adenopoda". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T37389A10043828. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T37389A10043828.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
